# üêû Bug Report

### Description

<!-- ‚úçÔ∏è--> After running the beacon chain and validator for a day, my beacon chain crashed. I noticed this after I saw my validator skipping attestations. Restarted it, and now I'm back in sync and my validator is back on track. 

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

<!-- Did this behavior use to work in the previous version? -->
<!-- ‚úçÔ∏è--> No idea, started my node for topaz testnet. 

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

<!--
Please let us know how we can reproduce this issue. Include the exact method you used to run Prysm along with any flags used in your beacon chain and/or validator. Make sure you don't upload any confidential files or private keys.
-->
`./prysm.sh beacon-chain` 
`./prysm.sh validator --password=xxxxxxxxxx --keystore-path=$HOME/validator`
